topic.title: EMS Patient Systolic Blood Pressure - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-108)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CodeSystem: EMSTEMPVS_015 NEMSIS) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-109)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CodeSystem: EMSTEMPVS_015 NEMSIS) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-109)
